headline: Tell HN: You don't need Karabiner for simple macOS key remappings
description:
I have been relying on Karabiner but it has been a tad buggy with my Ryzentosh.

So was very happy to learn that since Sierra (10.12) hidutil supports simple remappings!

Here is a simple tool to help you generate a remapping plist file.

https://hidutil-generator.netlify.app

Happy remapping!
